definition: a natural stream of water smaller than a river (and often a tributary of a river), to put up with something or somebody unpleasant
details:
noun
- a natural stream of water smaller than a river (and often a tributary of a river)
= synonyms: creek
verb
- to put up with something or somebody unpleasant
= example: to put up with something or somebody unpleasant
= synonyms: support
